==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=不见棺材不掉泪|type=2212}}

===Etymology===
Literally: not shed a tear until one sees the coffin

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=不jiàn guāncai 不 diàolèi
|c=bat1 gin3 gun1 coi4 bat1 diu6 leoi6
|cat=prov
}}

===Proverb===
{{zh-proverb}}

# Refuse to be convinced until one is faced with the grim [[reality]]; [[tenacious]], [[resolute]] or [[pertinacious]] in one's pursuit of a goal despite of [[obstacle]]s or [[advice]].

* {{zh-l|留得青山在，不怕沒柴燒}}
* {{zh-l|不到黃河心不死}}
* {{qualifier|Cantonese}} {{zh-l|唔見棺材唔流眼淚}}
* {{th-l|ไม่เห็นโลงศพ ไม่หลั่งน้ำตา}}
